to have plenty of laughs at Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell 's expense but now they've been replaced with Michael McIntyre and David Hasselhoff . Ant McPartlin admitted BGT had changed without those two big egos to prick. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better. "Hoff does a great job but isn't Simon Cowell or Piers Morgan . You miss Simon Cowell because he is the best judge. He has that ability to say what you at home are thinking. Declan Donnelly added: "For me, it's just great to be able to introduce the guy from Knight Rider every day... to a backing track of the Knight Rider theme tune."

that phone hacking was carried out by a couple of rogue employees. David Cameron said that he was very sorry Andy Coulson had quit, and believed his claim that he was ignorant of the spying. Andy Coulson resigned from the News of the World when he found out what was happening, David Cameron said. "I've always felt he's been punished for the same offense twice." The weekly News of the World has a circulation of more than 3 million and thrives on celebrity exclusives

Bloomberg)-- Andy Coulson resigned as director of communications for U.K. Prime Minister David Cameron , citing "continuing pressures" over allegations of illegal phone tapping while he was editor of the News of the World newspaper. Unfortunately continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in this role, Andy Coulson said in an e-mailed statement today. "Nothing is more important than the government's task of getting this country back on its feet." Andy Coulson resigned from the newspaper, owned by Rupert Murdoch 's

returns from visit with Gabrielle Giffords Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand ( D-N.Y.) returned Monday from Houston, where she visited with Rep. Gabrielle Giffords ( D-Ariz.), who is recovering from a gunshot wound to the head. Returned fr Houston today. Gabrielle Giffords continues to defy the odds& is so appreciative of all your support. Pls cont to keep her in your prayers, Kirsten Gillibrand posted on her Twitter account. Gabrielle Giffords was shot in the head at close range during a public event in Tucson, Ariz., on Jan. 8. NFC starting quarterback Michael Vick of Philadelphia probably appreciates his appearance more than anyone on either side of the ball, considering how far he has come since serving prison time for his role in dogfighting operation.
